dataset.title: GIS02 GIS Coverages Defining the Konza Prairie Experimental Watershed treatments

address.deliveryPoint: 116 Ackert Hall, Division of Biology, Kansas State University

para.literalLayout: This dataset defines the experimental watershed treatments for the Konza Prairie Biological Station (KPBS). These treatments have changed over time to represent changes in both physical boundaries as well as changes in watershed treatments. These data are available as zipped (.zip) shapefiles (.shp).

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: KansasKonza Prairie Biological StationLTERRiley CountyKNZGeary county

description.para: For additional methods information see: http://www.konza.ksu.edu/KNZ/docs/MM.pdf

spatialVector.entityDescription: This dataset defines the experimental watershed treatments for the Konza Prairie Biological Station (KPBS). These treatments have changed over time to represent changes in both physical boundaries as well as changes in watershed treatments. These data are available as zipped (.zip) shapefiles (.shp). This datatype defines the historical usage of the land that would become the Konza Prairie Biological Station.

externallyDefinedFormat.formatName: zip file with ARC/INFO shape file

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Kansas Geary county, Konza Prairie Biological Station, LTER KNZ, Riley County

textDomain.definition: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Coordinates defining the features.

parameter.name: Scale factor at central meridian
parameter.description: a multiplier for reducing a distance obtained from a map by computation or scaling to the actual distance along the central meridian.

parameter.name: Longitude at central meridian
parameter.description: The line of logitude at the center of the map projection

parameter.name: Latitude of projection origin
parameter.description: The latitude chosen as center of the projection

parameter.name: False Easting
parameter.description: A value added in a rectangular coordinate system, usually used to avoid negative values

parameter.name: False Northing
parameter.description: A value added in a rectangular coordinate system, usually used to avoid negative values

spatialVector.entityDescription: This dataset defines the experimental watershed treatments for the Konza Prairie Biological Station (KPBS). These treatments have changed over time to represent changes in both physical boundaries as well as changes in watershed treatments. These data are available as zipped (.zip) shapefiles (.shp). This datatype defines the managing treatments for the Konza Prairie Biological Station (KPBS) beginning in 1972.

externallyDefinedFormat.formatName: zip file with ARC/INFO shape file
